entry.title: For Her Viewing Pleasure
entry.summary:
Author: kitnotkat95

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,385Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 24

Summary: It's a game they play. Maybe more like a secret than a game, something just for the three of them: Cassandra, Stephanie, and Jason. Game, or secret, or secret game, it made attending these events for the family much more fun.Sometimes, Cassandra's body was overwhelming to her in the way that it wanted, even more so when it came to sharing her body with others to satisfy those wants. A work around that she and Steph had discovered was that Cass very much liked to watch…up to a point. So, when they'd needed someone to satiate that desire, it had to be someone they knew could be trusted, who wouldn't judge, and who could, relatively speaking, handle themselves should Cassandra's possessive streak rear its head in the moment. Of course, it'd also need to be someone that Stephanie would want to have sex with. All of these factors had narrowed the list of possible candidates quite considerably, Jason fit the bill.Tonight, they were trying something different.For Batship Winter/ Cassandra Week Prompt: charity gala, exhibitionism/voyeurism, possessiveness, clothes sharing

entry.title: Baby, Don't You Like This Beat? (I made it so you'd sleep with me)
entry.summary:
Author: kitnotkat95

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,473Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 40

Summary: Steph was having a fantastic night, her finals were done and over with and a girl from her chem lab had invited her to what ended up being an awesome party.More accurately, Steph had been having a fantastic night until she decided she it was too hot inside at the party and she was ready to go curl up in her dorm for the night so she wouldn't be too tired to go meet Tim for their celebratory brunch tomorrow. She hadn't realized until partway through the walk back that she'd forgotten her coat and she was suddenly freezing.That wouldn't have been such a big deal with how close she was to her dorm, except once she'd gotten there she learned that along with her coat her wallet and keys were missing, meaning that she couldn't get into the building.Luckily, before anything could get too dire she saw that the campus convenience store still had its lights on so probably wasn't shutting down for the break just yet.featuring: drunk Steph & tired grad student/corner store employee JasonFor Batship Winter/ Steph Week Prompt: Frostbite, Meet-Cute, & Breeding Kink

entry.title: Justice in Life or Justice in Death? (DISCONTINUED)
entry.summary:
Author: Wolfer13579

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 5,549Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 49

Summary: 2.5 years after Jason Todd-Smith disappeared and believed dead, and Stephanie Brown has tried to move on, only to get her heart broken again. Trying to distract herself, she goes on patrol more often, and finds herself interested in Gotham’s newest vigilante. There’s only one problem; this new vigilante hates the Bats, and would rather see them dead, along with most of Gotham’s Rogues. Who is this man, and why does he choose to make Spoiler an exception from the group of vigilantes he wants dead? Takes place 6 months after the ending of Jason Todd-Smith. (Discontinued)
